ishfrm.label: Map
ishfrm.description: A DITA map organizes topics and other resources into structured collections of information. DITA maps specify hierarchy and the relationships among the topics; they also provide the contexts in which DITA keys are defined and resolved.

ishfrm.label: Bookmap
ishfrm.description: A bookmap describes the relationships among a set of DITA topics intended to be configured as a traditional book. Bookmaps consist of references to topics organized as book content. The topic references therefore are labeled according to the book components they point to, such as booktitle, frontmatter, chapter, and appendix.

ishfrm.label: Anchor
ishfrm.description: The <anchor> element provides an integration point that another map can reference in order to insert its navigation into the current navigation tree. For those familiar with Eclipse help systems, this serves the same purpose as the <anchor> element in that system. It may not be supported for all output formats.

ishfrmfield.name: IdField
ishfrmfield.label: &Identifier
ishfrmfield.description: Provides an integration point that another map may reference in order to insert its navigation into the current navigation tree. The anchorref attribute on a map may be used to reference this attribute.

ishfrm.label: AnchorRef
ishfrm.description: The <anchorref> element is used to reference an <anchor> element in a map.

ishfrmfield.name: HRefField
ishfrmfield.label: HRef
ishfrmfield.description: A pointer to an <anchor> element in this or another DITA map. When rendered, the contents of the <anchorref> element will be copied to the location of the anchor.

ishfrm.label: Topic Ref
ishfrm.script: Public Sub Form_Validating(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) 'Either HRef Field or KeyDef Field is mandatory, so at least one 'field must have a value filled in! If (Me.Fields.Contains("HRefField")) AndAlso (Me.Fields.Contains("KeysField")) Then Dim hrefField As Field = Me.Fields("HRefField") Dim keysField As Field = Me.Fields("KeysField") If (String.IsNullOrEmpty(hrefField.SerializedValue)) AndAlso (String.IsNullOrEmpty(keysField.SerializedValue)) Then If keysField.IsHidden Then Throw New Exception("No value specified for field HRef. A value must be specified for field HRef.") Else Throw New Exception("No value specified for the fields HRef and Key Definition. A value must be specified for at least one of the fields HRef or Key Definition.") End If End If End If End Sub

ishfrm.label: Topic Ref
ishfrm.script: Public Sub Form_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) '*** Uncomment following code to set the navtitle to the logical object title, when dragging an object into a map in Publication Manager (TS-11798). 'If (Me.Fields.Contains("HRefField")) Then ' Dim hrefField As Field = Me.Fields("HRefField") ' If (Me.Fields.Contains("NavTitleField")) Then ' Dim navTitleField As Field = Me.Fields("NavTitleField") ' If (String.IsNullOrEmpty(navTitleField.SerializedValue)) Then ' navTitleField.SerializedValue = hrefField.DisplayText ' End If ' End If 'End If End Sub Public Sub Form_Validating(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) 'Either HRef Field or KeyDef Field is mandatory, so at least one 'field must have a value filled in! If (Me.Fields.Contains("HRefField")) AndAlso (Me.Fields.Contains("KeysField")) Then Dim hrefField As Field = Me.Fields("HRefField") Dim keysField As Field = Me.Fields("KeysField") If (String.IsNullOrEmpty(hrefField.SerializedValue)) AndAlso (String.IsNullOrEmpty(keysField.SerializedValue)) Then If keysField.IsHidden Then Throw New Exception("No value specified for field HRef. A value must be specified for field HRef.") Else Throw New Exception("No value specified for the fields HRef and Key Definition. A value must be specified for at least one of the fields HRef or Key Definition.") End If End If End If End Sub

ishfrmfield.name: CollectionTypeField
ishfrmfield.label: Collection type
ishfrmfield.description: Collection types describe how links relate to each other. A family represents a tight grouping in which each of the referenced topics not only relates to the current topic but also relate to each other.

ishfrmfield.name: RelTableTitleField
ishfrmfield.label: Relationship table title
ishfrmfield.description: Title used for the Relationship table in the map.

ishfrmfield.name: RelColSpecTypeField
ishfrmfield.label: Relationship column specification type
ishfrmfield.description: Type of topics gathered within the relationship column.

ishfrm.label: Part
ishfrm.script: Public Sub Form_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) '*** Uncomment following code to set the navtitle to the logical object title, when dragging an object into a map in Publication Manager (TS-11798). 'If (Me.Fields.Contains("HRefField")) Then ' Dim hrefField As Field = Me.Fields("HRefField") ' If (Me.Fields.Contains("NavTitleField")) Then ' Dim navTitleField As Field = Me.Fields("NavTitleField") ' If (String.IsNullOrEmpty(navTitleField.SerializedValue)) Then ' navTitleField.SerializedValue = hrefField.DisplayText ' End If ' End If 'End If End Sub

ishfrm.label: Learning Map
ishfrm.description: A learning map organizes learning and training topics and other resources into structured collections of information. They specify the hierarchy and the relationships among the topics; they also provide the contexts in which DITA keys are defined and resolved.

ishfrm.label: Learning Bookmap
ishfrm.description: A learning bookmap describes the relationships among a set of DITA learning and training topics intended to be configured as a traditional book. The references therefore are labeled according to the book components they point to, such as booktitle, frontmatter, chapter, and appendix.

ishfrm.label: Learning Group Map
ishfrm.description: A learning group map enables authors to create standalone aggregations of learningObject and learningGroup elements, as well as overviews, summaries, and assessments, according to the needs identified by the learning goals and objectives.

ishfrm.label: Learning Object Map
ishfrm.description: A learning object map enables authors to create standalone aggregations of learningContent together with its supporting plan, overview, summary, and assessments, according to the needs identified by the learning goals and objectives.

ishfrm.label: Subject Scheme Map
ishfrm.description: A subject scheme map uses key definitions to define collections of controlled values and subject definitions for attributes in a DITA XML.

ishfrm.label: Classification Map
ishfrm.description: A classification map enables map authors to indicate information about the subject matter of DITA topics. The subjects are defined in subject scheme maps, and the map authors reference the subjects using the @keyref attribute.

readonly.ishcondition: ChangeMode in ('Update') or (ClientName in ('ClientTools') and CreateReason in ('NewVersion', 'NewObject', 'CheckInAs', 'Duplicate', 'Import'))

ishfrmfield.description: Indicates whether variables need to be resolved when publishing.

ishfrmfield.name: IncludeMissingObjectsField
ishfrmfield.label: &Include missing objects
ishfrmfield.description: Indicates whether to export placeholder object files (e.g. ISHPUBLILLUSTRATIONMISSING) to show that objects are missing when publishing.

ishfrmfield.name: EditorTemplateIconField
ishfrmfield.label: Editor template &icon filename
ishfrmfield.description: This field will be a filename, e.g. Topic.png. If an empty/wrong filename is provided a fall-back to a default icon is done.

ishfrmfield.name: EditorTemplateDescriptionField
ishfrmfield.label: Editor template &description
ishfrmfield.description: Free text that describes the editor template.

ishfrmfield.name: SDLLiveContentServerField
ishfrmfield.label: UR&L of the server
ishfrmfield.description: Obsolete, only for historical reference. URL of the SDL Tridion Docs Content Delivery server.

ishfrmfield.name: SDLLiveContentUserNameField
ishfrmfield.label: &User name
ishfrmfield.description: Obsolete, only for historical reference. User name to connect to SDL Tridion Docs Content Delivery (only needed without SSO).

ishfrmfield.name: SDLLiveContentPassWordField
ishfrmfield.label: &Password
ishfrmfield.description: Obsolete, only for historical reference. Password for this account (only needed without SSO).

ishfrmfield.name: SDLDitaDeliveryServerUriField
ishfrmfield.label: Dynamic Delivery discovery URL
ishfrmfield.description: URL of the Dynamic Delivery discovery service.

ishfrmfield.name: SDLDitaDeliveryClientIdField
ishfrmfield.label: Client ID
ishfrmfield.description: The client ID used to connect to the Dynamic Delivery discovery service.

ishfrmfield.name: SDLDitaDeliveryClientSecretField
ishfrmfield.label: Client secret
ishfrmfield.description: The client secret used to connect to the Dynamic Delivery discovery service.

ishfrmfield.name: SDLDitaDeliveryIdPrefixField
ishfrmfield.label: ID prefix
ishfrmfield.description: The prefix used as a part of the IDS in the package that is send to the Dynamic Delivery deployer service.

ishfrmfield.name: DitaDeliveryTopologyUrisField
ishfrmfield.label: Hosting base URL(s)
ishfrmfield.description: The hosting base URL(s).

ishfrmfield.name: SDLXPPServerField
ishfrmfield.label: SDL &XPP server URL
ishfrmfield.description: URL of the server that hosts the SDL XPP application that this output format will use.

ishfrmfield.name: SDLXPPStyleFolderField
ishfrmfield.label: SDL XPP style &folder
ishfrmfield.description: Style used to render the output in the SDL XPP application. If both style reference and folder are available, first the Reference is copied and then the Folder changes are applied (incremental update facility).

ishfrmfield.name: SDLXPPStyleReferenceField
ishfrmfield.label: SDL XPP style &reference
ishfrmfield.description: Style bundle reference used to render the output in the SDL XPP application. If both style reference and folder are available, first the reference is copied and then the folder changes are applied (incremental update facility).

ishfrmfield.name: SDLXPPStyleAltNameField
ishfrmfield.label: SDL XPP style &Alt name
ishfrmfield.description: Alt name available in the referenced StyleBundle used to render the output in the SDL XPP application.

ishfrmfield.name: PDF2CustomizationDirField
ishfrmfield.label: &PDF2 customization
ishfrmfield.description: Customization directory to be used by the PDF2 transformation type in the DITA Open Toolkit. If empty the default Customization dir (named 'Customization') will be used.

ishfrmfield.name: AnchorRefField
ishfrmfield.label: &Anchor ref
ishfrmfield.description: Enables authors to define a map fragment that is pushed to the location defined by an anchor.

ishfrmfield.name: NavTitleField
ishfrmfield.label: &Navigation title
ishfrmfield.description: Short title used in the map.

ishfrmfield.name: ConditionField
ishfrmfield.label: &Condition
ishfrmfield.description: Condition.

ishfrmfield.name: FormatField
ishfrmfield.label: Format
ishfrmfield.description: Supply the format.

ishfrmfield.name: LinkingField
ishfrmfield.label: &Linking
ishfrmfield.description: Supply 'normal' in case the link is bi-directional.

ishfrmfield.name: KeysField
ishfrmfield.label: Key definition
ishfrmfield.description: Key definition (Key for use in keyref).

ishfrmfield.name: HRefField
ishfrmfield.label: &HRef
ishfrmfield.description: Reference to the object you want to add.
ishfrmfield.script: Public Sub Field_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) Me.UpdateFormatField() End Sub Public Sub Field_ValueChanged(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) '*** Uncomment following code to set the navtitle to the logical object title, when dragging an object into a map in Publication Manager (TS-11798). 'If (Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(Me.DisplayText)) Then ' If (Me.Form.Fields.Contains("NavTitleField")) Then ' Dim navTitleField As Field = Me.Form.Fields("NavTitleField") ' navTitleField.SerializedValue = Me.DisplayText ' End If 'End If Me.UpdateFormatField() End Sub Private Sub UpdateFormatField() If Me.Form.Fields.Contains("FormatField") Then Dim field As Field = Me.Form.Fields("FormatField") If Not Me.FieldValue Is Nothing Then Dim obj As Object = Me.FieldValue.Source If Not obj Is Nothing Then If obj.ObjectType2.Name = "ISHMasterDoc" Then field.SerializedValue = "ditamap" ElseIf obj.ObjectType2.Name = "ISHModule" Then field.SerializedValue = "dita" ElseIf obj.ObjectType2.Name = "ISHLibrary" Then field.SerializedValue = "dita" Else field.SerializedValue = obj.ContentType.DefaultExtension End If End If Else field.SerializedValue = "" End If End If End Sub

ishfrmfield.name: HRefField
ishfrmfield.label: &HRef
ishfrmfield.description: Reference to the map you want to add.
ishfrmfield.script: Public Sub Field_ValueChanged(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) '*** Uncomment following code to set the navtitle to the logical object title, when dragging an object into a map in Publication Manager (TS-11798). 'If (Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(Me.DisplayText)) Then ' If (Me.Form.Fields.Contains("NavTitleField")) Then ' Dim navTitleField As Field = Me.Form.Fields("NavTitleField") ' navTitleField.SerializedValue = Me.DisplayText ' End If 'End If End Sub

ishfrmfield.name: IntelProgramNameField
ishfrmfield.label: &Program Name:
ishfrmfield.description: Intel program name.

ishfrmfield.name: IxiaSoftIDField
ishfrmfield.label: &IxiaSoft ID
ishfrmfield.description: IxiaSoft ID of the object.

ishfrmfield.name: IxiaSoftSystemCommentsField
ishfrmfield.label: &System Comments
ishfrmfield.description: Captures system comments for every version of the imported object

ishfrmfield.name: IxiaSoftUserCommentsField
ishfrmfield.label: &User Comments
ishfrmfield.description: Captures user comments for every version of the imported object

ishfrmfield.name: IxiaSoftCreatedDateField
ishfrmfield.label: Metadata Created on
ishfrmfield.description: The date when the metadata of the current object was created

ishfrmfield.name: IxiaSoftModifiedDateField
ishfrmfield.label: Metadata modified on
ishfrmfield.description: The date when the metadata of the current object was last modified

ishfrmfield.name: IxiaSoftModifiedByField
ishfrmfield.label: &Modified by
ishfrmfield.description: The name of the user who modified
